Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ALCOHOLISM AND SUBSTANCE USE DISORDERS

Title: Renames an office of addiction services and supports scholarship program the NYS Father Peter Young Memorial Addiction Professionals Scholarship Program
Summary: Renames an office of addiction services and supports scholarship program the "NYS Father Peter Young Memorial Addiction Professionals Scholarship Program"; codifies the purposes of such program as offering financial education assistance to individuals pursuing a bachelor's degree in addiction studies or the education requirements for an office of addiction services and supports credential at Alfred State College, Stony Brook University or Empire State University.
LawCode: Amd ยง19.07, Ment Hyg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the mental hygiene law, in relation to renaming an office of addiction services and supports scholarship program the "NYS Father Peter Young Memorial Addiction Professionals Scholarship Program"
